text: The fifth-generation iPad Mini (stylized and marketed as iPad mini and colloquially referred to as iPad mini 5) is a tablet computer in the iPad Mini line that is made and sold by Apple Inc. It was first released on March 18, 2019. It supports the Apple Pencil. Like the iPad mini 4, it comes in 3 different colors: Silver, Space Gray and also Gold. It also comes in 2 different storage options: 64GB and 256GB. It costs $399 with Wi-Fi only and costs $529 with both Wi-Fi and cellular. == References == Category:IPad
title: IPad Mini (5th generation)
